column6: Electro has been humiliated by that Spider-Punk long enough. Now it's time to get some RESPECT. With the juice that runs New York City in his hands, the world will learn that Electro isn't one to be trifled with!
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | penciller (cover):Tony Daniel | inker:Norman Lee | writer:Sean McKeever | penciller:Patrick Scherberger
